Title: sum
Description: Calculates the sum. Only works for numbers.
num: Column of numeric values. (U)Int*, Float*, Decimal*.
The sum of the values. (U)Int*, Float*, Decimal*.
Examples: CREATE TABLE employees(    `id` UInt32,    `name` String,    `salary` UInt32)ENGINE = Log
INSERT INTO employees VALUES    (87432, 'John Smith', 45680),    (59018, 'Jane Smith', 72350),    (20376, 'Ivan Ivanovich', 58900),    (71245, 'Anastasia Ivanovna', 89210);
